Controllers¶

class app.controllers.empleo.EmpleoController¶

Bases: object

create_empleo(body: EmpleoRequest)¶

Creates a new Empleo in the database

delete_empleo(id: int)¶

Deletes an Empleo record by ID.

Parameters:

id (int) – The ID of the empleo to delete.

Returns:

A dictionary with the status of the delete operation.

Return type:

dict

get_all_empleos()¶

Gets all Empleo records

update_empleo(body: EmpleoRequest, id: int)¶

Updates an Empleo record by ID.

Parameters:

  • body (EmpleoRequest) – The request body containing the updated empleo data.

  • id (int) – The ID of the empleo to update.

Returns:

A dictionary with the status of the update operation.

Return type:

dict
